name: com.mytoolz.audio
description: ScriptableObject-based audio system with configurable AudioSource settings, randomized clip selection, pitch variation, pooling, and AudioSource extension methods for streamlined playback. Requires Zenject (https://github.com/modesttree/Zenject), DOTween (https://dotween.demigiant.com/), UniTask (https://github.com/Cysharp/UniTask)
